oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marguerite Piazza at Mardi Gras
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Piazza, Marguerite; portraits; Mardi Gras;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Krewe of Virgilians 1935 queen was Marguerite Piazza Luft (who went on to fame as opera singer Marguerite Piazza). She portrayed Francesca da Rimini, “Flame of Hades.” The King, at her left, is Joseph C. Menendez.
